item.title: JuliaDB A data system for Julia
item.description:
Description

Modern data analysis pipelines routinely involve gluing together multiple systems and languages: SQL, Python, R, C++, unix tools, and more. This leads to unnecessary complexity and inefficiency. JuliaDB is a fast, productivity-focused, distributed database that, together with the Julia language, forms a single coherent system for everything from data preparation to machine learning with no glue.
item.dc:creator: Jeff Bezanson

item.title: Julia for Modern Data Analysis
item.description:
Description

Julia is a dynamic, high-performance language for technical computing. This talk will describe where the newcomer Julia may fit into a data science ecosystem already full of rich libraries in R and Python.
item.dc:creator: Josh Day
